statements: SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_date FROM quantum_simulation_experiments ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE simulation_type='Quantum Computing';
SELECT result_description FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_id=101;
SELECT experiment_id, result_description FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT experiment_id, simulation_type FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE simulation_type LIKE '%quantum%';
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT simulation_type) AS unique_simulation_types FROM quantum_simulation_experiments;
SELECT result_description FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE result_description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(result_description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_results;
SELECT experiment_name, simulation_result FROM quantum_simulation_results ORDER BY simulation_date DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, simulation_date FROM quantum_simulation_results WHERE experiment_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT experiment_name, log_message FROM quantum_simulation_results JOIN quantum_simulation_logs ON quantum_simulation_results.experiment_id = quantum_simulation_logs.experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_results WHERE experiment_id = 1
SELECT experiment_name, simulation_date FROM quantum_simulation_results WHERE experiment_id > 5 ORDER BY simulation_date DESC
SELECT experiment_name, simulation_result->>'energy' AS energy FROM quantum_simulation_results WHERE simulation_result->>'energy' > 0.5
SELECT experiment_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM quantum_simulation_logs GROUP BY experiment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT experiment_name, log_timestamp FROM quantum_simulation_results r INNER JOIN quantum_simulation_logs l ON r.experiment_id = l.experiment_id WHERE l.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM quantum_simulation_experiments
SELECT * FROM simulation_results WHERE experiment_id = 3
SELECT result_data FROM simulation_results WHERE result_timestamp = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'
SELECT experiment_id, comparison_result, comparison_date FROM comparison_data ORDER BY comparison_date DESC
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_id = 1
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT experiment_name, result_data FROM quantum_simulation_experiments JOIN simulation_results ON quantum_simulation_experiments.experiment_id = simulation_results.experiment_id WHERE simulation_results.result_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments WHERE experiment_description LIKE '%quantum%'
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulation_experiments ORDER BY experiment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM quantum_simulations;
SELECT experiment_date, simulation_result FROM quantum_simulations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, research_field FROM experiment_details ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_id, experiment_description FROM experiment_details WHERE research_field = 'Physics';
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE '%threshold%';
SELECT id, experiment_date, simulation_result FROM quantum_simulations;
SELECT * FROM experiment_details ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT experiment_description, researcher_name FROM experiment_details WHERE research_field = 'Quantum Computing' AND researcher_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT simulation_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM simulation_parameters WHERE parameter_name IN ('Speed', 'Accuracy') ORDER BY simulation_id ASC;

SELECT s1.simulation_id as simulation_id1, s2.simulation_id as simulation_id2, cr.similarity_score FROM comparison_results cr JOIN simulation_parameters s1 ON cr.simulation_id1 = s1.simulation_id JOIN simulation_parameters s2 ON cr.simulation_id2 = s2.simulation_id WHERE cr.similarity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY cr.similarity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM experiment_data;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment_data ORDER BY experiment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researcher_info WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT experiment_name, quantum_results FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, tag_name FROM experiment_tags WHERE tag_name LIKE 'Quantum%';
SELECT * FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_id = 1;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT experiment_id, researcher_name, result_timestamp FROM researcher_info JOIN experiment_results ON researcher_info.researcher_id = experiment_results.experiment_id;
SELECT tag_name FROM experiment_tags WHERE experiment_id = (SELECT experiment_id FROM experiment_data WHERE experiment_name = 'Quantum Entanglement Experiment');
SELECT * FROM comparison_data ORDER BY comparison_date DESC LIMIT 5;
